label: Link Scientific Domain to CMIP7
description:
## Link Scientific Domain to CMIP7

Select scientific domains from WCRP-constants to make available in CMIP7.

> [!NOTE]
> Please ensure you are familiar with the completion guidance in the collapsible dropdown where it exists. Failure to do so will result in a failed submission.
> For more information: [consult the documentation](https://cmip7.mipcvs.dev/docs)

label: Scientific Domain
description: If your scientific domain is not listed below, you must first register it in the [WCRP-constants repository](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=scientific_domain.yml) after which it should appear in the dropdown below.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
